LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome back
LOGIN.KEEP_SIGNED_IN: Keep me signed in for 30 days

DEMO_MODAL.TITLE: Demo Access
DEMO_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Use the seeded credentials below to preview the platform experience.

ERRORS.AUTH_FAILED: Unable to sign in at the moment. Please try again.
ERRORS.EMAIL_INVALID: Enter a valid business email address.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_MIN: Password must be at least 8 characters.

REGISTER.TITLE: Create your workspace
REGISTER.ACCEPT_TERMS: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

SUCCESS_MODAL.TITLE: Workspace Ready
SUCCESS_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Your account was provisioned successfully. Continue to your dashboard to start managing projects and tasks.
SUCCESS_MODAL.NOTE: JWT access and refresh tokens are now active, and protected routes are unlocked.

ERRORS.PROVISION_FAILED: Account provisioning failed. Please retry in a few moments.
ERRORS.EMAIL_INVALID: Use a valid business email format.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_MIN: Password must be at least 10 characters.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_PATTERN: Include at least one uppercase letter and one number.
ERRORS.TERMS_REQUIRED: You must accept the terms to continue.

TOAST.LOGIN_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You are now signed in and ready to work.
TOAST.LOGOUT_MESSAGE: You have been signed out of Enterprise Workspace.

EMPTY_STATE.TITLE: No projects match your filter
EMPTY_STATE.DESCRIPTION: Try another status or widen your search to view more portfolio items.

CREATE_MODAL.TITLE: Create New Project
CREATE_MODAL.SUBTITLE: Capture core details now. Deeper configuration can follow inside project settings.

FORM_ERRORS.CREATE_FAILED: Project creation failed. Please retry in a moment.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Project Settings
SETTINGS.SUBTITLE: Changes are auto-saved while you type.

ARCHIVE_MODAL.TITLE: Archive this project?
ARCHIVE_MODAL.SUBTITLE: Archiving keeps history but marks delivery as inactive.
ARCHIVE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: This action will move the project into read-only mode for the team. You can restore it later from settings.

SHOWCASE.TITLE: One workflow from planning to reporting.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Trusted by product and operations teams.

HERO.SUPPORT: Plan priorities, execute daily work, and report outcomes from one system.

PLANNING.TITLE: Portfolio Planning
PLANNING.SUMMARY: Build initiatives, priorities, and dependencies with shared context so strategy and execution stay synchronized.

DELIVERY.TITLE: Team Execution Boards
DELIVERY.SUMMARY: Run sprint workflows with premium Kanban controls, operational guardrails, and real-time delivery visibility.

ANALYTICS.TITLE: Operational Analytics
ANALYTICS.SUMMARY: Track throughput, risk, and impact in one dashboard built for product leaders, PMOs, and executives.

GOVERNANCE.TITLE: Enterprise Governance
GOVERNANCE.SUMMARY: Role-aware access, auditable activity history, and policy-safe delivery workflows for enterprise confidence.

AUTOMATION.TITLE: Workflow Automation
AUTOMATION.SUMMARY: Auto-route work, trigger lifecycle updates, and simplify handoffs so teams spend more time delivering value.

SCALE.TITLE: Scalable Workspace
SCALE.SUMMARY: From one squad to global programs, keep a consistent operating model without sacrificing team autonomy.

STRATEGIC.TITLE: Align portfolio priorities.
STRATEGIC.DESCRIPTION: Visualize strategic initiatives, owners, and blockers in one workspace built for alignment meetings and execution reviews.

EXECUTION.TITLE: Keep teams moving with live status.
EXECUTION.DESCRIPTION: From backlog grooming to release readiness, teams collaborate in a frictionless environment designed for momentum.

REPORTING.TITLE: Turn activity into clear outcomes.
REPORTING.DESCRIPTION: Automated insight panels surface risk, velocity, and performance trends so operations and executives stay informed.

C1.QUOTE: Enterprise Workspace gave us one operating rhythm across product, data, and operations. Delivery reviews are now focused on decisions, not status chasing.

C2.QUOTE: The product feels premium and practical. Our PMO moved from fragmented spreadsheets to shared execution in less than two weeks.

C3.QUOTE: From roadmap planning to sprint analytics, our leadership team gets the full story in minutes. It has changed how we run quarterly strategy.
